title: Already I have 16 + driving licence, now I want 18+. Which form should I fill? - Quora

response.answer_text: The pattern which is followed in making driving licence is that firstly you have to make your learning licence and it is valid for 6 months. After which you have to apply for permanent licence within 6months failing this your learning licence expires after 6 months and hence you again have to apply for learning licence.
